about_the_game: Behold, we have reached a decade of Party Pack soundtracks! The Jackbox Party Pack 10: Soundtrack has 105 bangers just waiting to be sucked in by your earholes. And they were composed by HUMANS, no less! No AI here, bub. So sit back and listen, while you imagine what kinds of gameplay might accompany them. Then go buy The Jackbox Party Pack 10 and see if you were right!
